meanings.sent1: The lousinesses in the old mattress made it uncomfortable to sleep on.
meanings.sent2: The lousinesses in the dog's fur required a thorough grooming session.
meanings.sent3: The lousinesses in the picnic blanket turned out to be tiny crumbs from the sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The lousinesses of the situation crawled around like tiny insects in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The lousinesses of the infestation was evident in the constant scratching of heads.

meanings.sent3: The lousinesses of the joke made everyone groan instead of laugh.
